script.name: Lib.X.ShipTemplateManager.Match
script.description: Lib: Ship Template Manager: Returns true if ship is equipped with template

line.comment: * Returns array if wares don't match (green), 2 if its only a config issue (yellow), TRUE if match (blue)
* If array is returned, its the wares required and the amounts

sval.val: Lib: Ship Template Manager: Returns true if ship is equipped with template
Returns array if wares don't match (green), 2 if its only a config issue (yellow), TRUE if match (blue)
If array is returned, its the wares required and the amounts
